headline: ​Wall Street Bullish on Innovative Solutions and Support, Inc. (ISSC) Amid Growing Avionics Opportunities
summary: Innovative Solutions and Support Inc. (NASDAQ:ISSC) is one of the best aerospace and defense stocks to buy according to Wall Street analysts. On December 18, Innovative Aerosystems reported strong fourth‑quarter and full‑year fiscal 2025 results, underscoring solid execution across its commercial, business aviation, and defense programs. Fourth‑quarter revenue rose 44.6% to $22.2 million, supported by […]
